West_Allis.Wisconsin Highway 341:
State Trunk Highway 341 (STH 341, WIS 341), better known as Miller Park Way, was the route designation of a segment of the oldest freeway in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. It connected Interstate 94 (I-94) to WIS 59 (National Avenue), with a single set of off-ramps to Canal Street and the parking lots of Miller Park.


== Route description ==
WIS 341 started at an intersection with National Avenue and Miller Park Way.
